AEC Federal Election Data

Source: vignettes/articles/available-data.rmd
available-data.rmd


This article explores the get_aec_data function and the data that it is able to retrieve from the Australian Electoral Commission’s website. This function is primarily retrieving the raw data with limited processing. For a more processed and ‘analysis-ready’ function, check out get_XXX](https://sarahcgallLtd.github.io/scgElectionsAU/reference/get_XXX.html).

In the get_aec_data function, the type argument default is “Federal Election”. This type extracts data from the AEC’s ‘Tally Room’ for elections between 2004 and 2022. Both House and Senate data are extractable.

National list of candidates

The National list of candidates dataset contains a list of candidates including whether or not the candidate was Elected or an incumbent (HistoricElected). This dataset exists for both Senate and House candidates.

There is the option to switch process to TRUE. In doing this, the 2004 dataset will be the same as the other election datasets by removing the SittingMemberFl column and replacing it with the Elected and HistoricElected columns. The HistoricElected column is based on the SittingMemberFl column and the Elected column is based on the Senators elected dataset.


Options for this dataset include:

  • file_name = National list of candidates
  • date_range = list(from = "2004-01-01", to = "2023-01-01")
  • category = c("House","Senate")
  • process = TRUE


Dataset output:

#> Downloading `National list of candidates` from https://results.aec.gov.au/27966/Website/Downloads/HouseCandidatesDownload-27966.csv
#> Successfully downloaded `National list of candidates` for the 2022 Federal Election
date event StateAb DivisionID DivisionNm PartyAb PartyNm CandidateID Surname GivenNm Elected HistoricElected
2022-05-21 2022 VIC 214 Goldstein ALP Australian Labor Party 36416 ABBOTT Martyn N N

Members/Senators elected

The Members elected and Senators elected datasets list the elected MPs and Senators at each election. The Senators elected dataset contains the ElectedOrder column.

There is no need to process this data as all election datasets are already standardised.


Options for the Members elected dataset include:

  • file_name = Members elected
  • date_range = list(from = "2004-01-01", to = "2023-01-01")
  • category = "House"


Dataset output:

#> Downloading `Members elected` from https://results.aec.gov.au/27966/Website/Downloads/HouseMembersElectedDownload-27966.csv
#> Successfully downloaded `Members elected` for the 2022 Federal Election
date event DivisionID DivisionNm StateAb CandidateID GivenNm Surname PartyNm PartyAb
2022-05-21 2022 179 Adelaide SA 36973 Steve GEORGANAS Australian Labor Party ALP


Options for the Senators elected dataset include:

  • file_name = Senators elected
  • date_range = list(from = "2004-01-01", to = "2023-01-01")
  • category = "Senate"


Dataset output:

#> Downloading `Senators elected` from https://results.aec.gov.au/27966/Website/Downloads/SenateSenatorsElectedDownload-27966.csv
#> Successfully downloaded `Senators elected` for the 2022 Federal Election
date event StateAb GivenNm Surname PartyNm PartyAb ElectedOrder
2022-05-21 2022 ACT Katy GALLAGHER Australian Labor Party ALP 1
